Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 16; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.A previous foliation sequence, which is also circled, has been superseded and therefore crossed out.

mods.abstract: Correspondence, some drafts, between the India Office, the Sultan of Muscat (Said bin Taimur [Sa‘īd ibn Taymūr Āl Bū Sa‘īd]), and the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf. The correspondence concerns the Sultan's wish to purchase a vessel for mainly customs purposes. Included are letters from the naval architects and engineers company, Sir J. H. Biles and Co., with details of the potential boats available on the second hand market (folios 9-13).
